name: @microexcel-csd/nativescript-hide-action-bar
description: NativeScript Angular plugin for easily hiding the ActionBar.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build undefined && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @microexcel-csd/nativescript-hide-action-bar && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i

author: Microexcel CSD
